oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Besides a short statement of the nature of the Dawns-Heart, and of his child (L II.-2. 292 and 293), we have two long pieces. About the Daybreak (Day's Heart or Dawn's Heart) Star which has a heart (that is red and 'flesh'). The Daybreak Star has a Daybreak Star Heart child when it is an old Daybreak Star Heart.
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: About the Daybreak Star
